column4: hello there...could someone tell me where can i find the default config file used to build the ubuntu kernel? i know there is a 2.6.19 linux-kernel available...i would prefer that one ;)
i think it's a bit different with every ubuntu kernel
so...i download the source and then?...i already did that and cant find the config file
what kernel version do you want?
hmm... 2.6.19? i think the latest edgy is using just 2.6.17 :-)
with every version the config differs
neither I:P I just want the ubuntu kernel config file!
i think it can be useful in some cases, but when building my own kernel i prefer "step by step" configuration :-)
yeah me too...but i am mading a comparation between settings used in the different distros....
